name: Keyword Router
author: Awenk Audico
description: Routes the workflow to different output ports based on keywords found in an input text. Output ports are created dynamically.

output_schema.name: [dynamic]
output_schema.description: Output ports are created dynamically based on the 'Output Port Name' in each rule. The payload is passed through unchanged.

output_schema.name: Default
output_schema.description: The output if no cases match. The payload is passed through unchanged.
